org.gvsig.raster.lib.buffer.api

Interface Buffer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Disposable, java.lang.Iterable<Band>, Observable, Observer, StatisticsCapable, WeakReferencingObservable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RasterSet
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBuffer, ClippedBuffer, ConvertedTypeBuffer, DefaultBuffer, DefaultRasterSet

    public interface Buffer
extends StatisticsCapable, java.lang.Iterable<Band>, Observer, Disposable

      • isInside

        boolean isInside(int cellX,
                 int cellY)
        Returns true if passed as parameter cell is inside of the buffer, else returns false.
        Parameters:
        cellX - Cell's x position
        cellY - Cell's y position
        Returns:
        true if cell is inside, false if it is outside
